column1: #Text=Polycrystalline TbFeAsO0.85 was prepared by a solid-state-reaction method.

#Text=At first, a precursor TbAs was prepared from Tb (20 mesh 3N in oil, Rare Metallic Co.) and As (powder 5N, High Purity Chemicals) with excess 1 mole % of As (i.e. starting composition Tb/ As = 1/ 1.01).
#Text=Beforehand, the oil was carefully removed by using CCl4 in an ultra sonic bath.
#Text=A mixture of the sources was put into an evacuated quartz tube and then slowly heated up in a furnace.
#Text=The heating was held at 500 째C for 10 hrs, followed by cooling down.
#Text=The product was carefully ground with an agate mortar and a pistol by hand, and then heated again at 850 째C for 8 hrs in the same manner.
